document.full_text: egyptian-born doctor and surgeon ayman al-zawahri is al qaeda's second-in-command expected to succeed osama bin laden following his killing in a firefight with u.s. forces in pakistan.
document.title: al qaeda no.2 zawahri most likely to succeed bin laden
lines_and_colors: egyptian-born doctor and surgeon ayman al-zawahri is al qaeda's second-in-command expected to succeed osama bin laden following his killing in a firefight with u.s. forces in pakistan.
